__e: You're problem is with me. not your classmates.

- I'm not just saying that - because we were classmates. - Oh, no.
I heard about what happened and called my other batchmates.
All aboard for high-flying fun with me, your friend to the end, the Good Guy doll from Play Pals.

Comrades, may I have your attention, please?
What happened to your little circle pals?

To those of our comrades who are not here tonight
